description: This file defines the AppState class which serves as a root container for global flags and service references within a Flutter application. It manages a local storage service and includes an initialization flag.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass that maintains application-wide state such as service references and flags.

methods.name: AppState
methods.description: Constructor that requires a LocalStorageService instance and initializes the AppState.

methods.name: initialized
methods.description: A getter that returns a boolean indicating if the app has been initialized (currently always true).
